errorBoundary.title: Kwenzeke Iphutha
errorBoundary.description: Kwenzeke iphutha elingalindelekanga. Sicela uzame futhi noma ubuyele ekhaya.

appError.title: Iphutha Lekhasi
appError.description: Kwenzeke iphutha ngokulayisha leli khasi. Sicela uzame futhi noma uye esigabeni esihlukile.

globalError.title: Iphutha Le-App
globalError.description: Sihlangabezane nephutha elingalindelekanga. Sicela uzame futhi noma ubuyele ekhaya.

feature.dataExport: Vula ukukhishwa kwe-PDF, okokulanda i-CSV, nokuningi
feature.advancedReports: Thola ukuhlaziywa okuthuthukisiwe nemibiko eyenziwe ngokwezifiso
feature.apiAccess: Xhumanisa idatha yakho nezinye izinhlelo zokusebenza

meta.title: Mali-X - I-Bhuku Lekredithi Edijithali Yama-UMKM
meta.description: Sebentisana ibhuku lekhathi lakho ne-app yokuphathwa ikredithi ekhaliphile, ethulelekile, iyatholakala sonke kunezisekelo ezincane.

hero.description: Vikela inzuzo yakho kwintela futhi ungalahlekelwa irekhodi. Ikhuselekile, i-sync ye-cloud, futhi yakhelwe ngokukhethekile ama-micro-SME ezimaketini ezikhulayo.

meta.title: Izici - Mali-X
meta.description: Hlola izici zonke ezinqande ze-app yokuphathwa ikredithi ye-Mali-X

features.title: Konke Okudingekile Ukuze Uphathe Ikredithi
features.subtitle: Kwakhiwe kuma-UMKM, ethembeka ngabanikazi bezitolo emhlabeni jikelele

localLanguage.title: Ukuxhasa Kolimi Lwasekhaya
localLanguage.description: Isebenza kolimi lakho nokuhlasela amalimi ayisikhombisa kuqukethi isiHindi, isiTurkish, isiSpanish, nanye.

multiCurrency.title: Ukuvikela Imali Eziningi
multiCurrency.description: Ukuxhasa zonke izinhlobo zezimali ezinkulu nokuupdate okuzenzakalela kwamarikhetingi.

offlineMode.title: Sebenza 100% Ngaphandle Kwenternet
offlineMode.description: Rekhoda ukuthengiselana ngisho nangati intanethi. I-sync ongaye ubheke esebenziseni intanethi.

cloudBackup.title: I-backup ye-Cloud Okuzenzakalela
cloudBackup.description: Idath yakho igcinwa ephephile ku-cloud. Ungasabi ulahleko irekhodi lakho lekredithi kwaphinde.

smsReminders.title: Izikhumbizi Ze-SMS
smsReminders.description: Thumela izikhumbizi zokukhokha abathengi ngokuzenzakalela nge-SMS.

reports.title: Izingxenye Ezinhle Zikashwazi
reports.description: Thola ukwaziswa ngeshishalo lakho ngezingxenye eziningi nezingcai.

howItWorks.title: Izinyathelo ezilula zokwenza idijithali
howItWorks.description: Shiya iphepha uqale ukuphatha ikhredithi yakho yebhizinisi ngezinyathelo ezintathu ezilula ezakhiwe ukuze kube nokusebenza kahle.

step1.title: Engeza Umthengi
step1.description: Misa ama-profiles kwabathengi bakho abajwayelekile ngemizuzwana. Ngena kusukela koontact noma engeza ngesandla.

step2.title: Qamba Isikweletu
step2.description: Landela ukuthengisa ngokubonakalayo. Isistimu yethu ihlela ngokuzenzakalela ngokwentela ukuvikela amaphuzu akho.

step3.title: Thola Intlawulo
step3.description: Thumela izikhumbuzi ze-WhatsApp ezenzakalelayo namakhonkco entlawulo. Thola izikweletu ngokushesha futhi ukhulise ukugijima kwemali.

cta.title: Ukulungele Ukuqala?
cta.description: Joyina izinkampani eziningi ezisebenzisa i-Ledgerly ukulawula ikhredithi yamakhasimende azo.

feature1.title: Ukuvikela Intela
feature1.description: Guqula ngokuzenzakalela izikweletu zemali ezinzima noma hlela ngokwamanye amanani ensuku ukugcina amandla okuthenga.

feature2.title: I-Cloud Sync kanye Ne-Offline Mode
feature2.description: Qhubeka urekhoda ukuthengiselana ngaphandle kwenternet. Konke ku-sync ngokushesha uma ubuya ku-online.

feature3.title: Ukhuseleko LweMphathandle
feature3.description: Idatha yakho iqinisekisiwe ukusuka ekuqaleni ukuya ekugcineni. Ungakhathazeki ukulahlekelwa amabhuku ephepha ngenxa yomlilo, ukweba, noma ukugqoka.

meta.title: Amanani - Mali-X
meta.description: Amanani ahlongozwans kuso sonke isayizi zoshishalo. Qala mahhala, vuselela lapho udinga khona.

faq.title: Imibuzo Evame Ukubuzwa
faq.a1: Yebo! I-Mali-X inikeza uhlelo lwamahhala phakade oluhlanganisa abathengi abangama-10, ukuthengiselana okungagcini, imodi ye-offline, namabhuloho okuyisisekelo. Awudingi ikhadi lesikweletu ukuqala.
faq.a2: Ngempela! I-Mali-X yakhiwe njenge-Progressive Web App (PWA) ngenkxaso ephelele ye-offline. Ungafaka abathengi, bhala izikweletu, futhi ulandele izinkokhelo ngisho ngaphandle kwe-inthanethi. Idata yakho i-synchronize ngokuzenzakalelayo uma ubuyela ku-online.
faq.a3: Idata yakho i-synchronize ngokuzenzakalelayo kumaserver ethu we-cloud avikelekile noma nini uma une-connection ye-inthanethi. Idata yonke iyakhodwa kusetshenziswa ukukhoda kwe-AES-256 yesigaba sebanki, ngakho-ke amarekhodi akho ahlala evikelekile futhi atholakala.
faq.a4: I-Mali-X ixhasa izimali eziningi kufaka phakathi i-TRY, IDR, NGN, EGP, ZAR, nokuningi. I-app itholakala ngezilimi eziyi-7: IsiTurki, IsiHindi, Isi-Indonesian, IsiNgisi, Isi-Arabhu, IsiSpanishi, kanye IsiZulu.

cta.title: Ukulungele Ukuqala?
cta.description: Joyina izinkampani ezinkulungwane ezisebenzisa i-Mali-X ukuphatha ikredithi yamakhasimende azo.

meta.title: Nge Thina - Mali-X
meta.description: Funda kabanzi nge mission ka-Mali-X yokuphatha ukulungisa ikredithi kuma-UMKM

about.title: Nge Mali-X
about.subtitle: Ukubonga amakhosi kuma-UMKM emhlabeni jikelele
about.intro: Sakha usuku lwobuchwepheshe bemali, siphaza ukuphathwa ikredithi kube lula futhi ivulelekile kuwonke.

mission.title: Umiso Wethu
mission.description: Ukulungisa izinsizakalo zezimali ngokunikeza izixazululo ezilula ezisiza ushishalo kanye abantu baqine ikredithi yabo ngokufanele.

vision.title: Ubuwembu Bethu
vision.description: Umhlaba apho ukwaziswa kwemali nokuphathwa ikredithi kuvumelekile wonke, osizwa ubuchwepheshe namazwi.

cta.title: Ukulungele Ukuqala?
cta.description: Joyina izinkampani eziningi ezisebenzisa i-Ledgerly ukulawula ikhredithi yamakhasimende azo.

meta.title: Thinta Kami - Mali-X
meta.description: Thinta iqhembakethu lethu ukuze uthole usizo, imibuzo, noma izinzwakalo

liveChat.title: Ingxoxo Ephilayo
liveChat.description: Xoxa nothimba lethu lusekelo ngesikhathi sebhizinisi.

cta.title: Udinga Usizo Olusheshayo?
cta.description: Bheka Isikhungo Sethu Sosizo imibuzo evamile.

recentActivity.emptyDescription: Start by adding your first customer or recording a transaction

empty.title: Siyakwamukela Ku-Mali-X
empty.description: Qala ukulandela ikredithi yamakhasimende akho ngokwengeza umakhasimende wakho wokuqala. Ungabhalisa ikredithi nokukhokha ukuze ulande ukuthi ubani okufanele akukhokhe.

paywall.upgradeMessage: Yenza i-Upgrade ku-Pro ukuze uthole amakhasimende angakhawulelwanga nezinye izici.

account.signOutConfirm: Uyaqinisekisa ufuna ukuphuma? Ungavame ukungena khona nge-email yakho.

upgradeModal.description: Khetha iphulani elihambelana nezidingo zakho zebhizinisi
upgradeModal.upgradeError: Ihlulekile ukukhuphula iphulani. Sicela uzame futhi.
upgradeModal.footerNote: Ungashintsha noma ukhansele iphulani lakho noma kunini. Akukho izindleko ezifihliwe.

signup.successDescription2: Sicela uhlole ibhokisi lakho (nedefolda yokucasula), bese uchofoza isixhumanisi ukuvunywa i-akhawunti yakho.

otpVerification.error: Ukuqinisekiswa kwe-OTP kuhlulekile noma iphasiwedi ayikwazanga ukuseshwa

passwordReset.successDescription: Iphasiwedi yakho isethwe kabusha ngempumelelo. Manje unganga nge-phasiwedi yakho entsha.

resetPassword.invalidToken: Ilinki lokusetha kabushi elingavumelekile noma esidlule
resetPassword.passwordTooShort: Iphasiwedi kumele ibe ama-6 okungenani amagama

otpExpired.description: Ilinki lokugunyaza i-imeyili sesidlalile. Sicela ucze omunye ngezansi.

empty.title: Idatha ayanele
empty.description: Yengeza abanye abathengi nokuthengiselana ukuze ubone imibiko nehlaziyiwe.

onboarding.subtitle: Misela i-akhawunti yakho ezinyathelweni ezimbalwa ezisheshayo

currency.subtitle: Khetha imali oyisebenzisela ukuthengiselana kwebizinisi lakho

category.subtitle: Khetha isigaba esichaza kahle ibizinisi lakho

category.title: Ibizinisi Lakho Yini?

sidebar.title: Ukukhangisa
sidebar.description: Sebenzisa i-sidebar ukuze ukhangise phakathi kwe-Dashboard, Abathengi, Ukuthengiselana, kanye Nezilungiselelo. Chofoza inkinobho yokwehlisa ukuze uyincishise.

quickAdd.title: Yengeza Ngokushesha
quickAdd.description: Yengeza ngokushesha ukuthengiselana olutsha lekredithi noma lokukhokha. Le nkinobho ihlale ikhona ukuze kungene ngokushesha.

stats.title: Izibalo Zakho
stats.description: Landa inani elisonke elikwele, ukukhokha okuqoqiwe, kanye nabathengi abasebenzayo ngokubuka okukodwa.

actions.title: Izenzo Ezisheshayo
actions.description: Finyelela ezintweni eziqhelekile njengokwengeza ikredithi, ukurekhoda ukukhokha, ukwengeza umthengi, noma ukuthumela izikhumbuzi.

activity.title: Ukuqamba Okuqoshiwe
activity.description: Buka ukuthengiselana kwakho okusha kakhulu futhi ulandele ukukhokha kwamakhasimende namakredithi.

faq.title: Imibuzo Evame Ukubuzwa
faq.subtitle: Konke okudingeka ukwazi mayelana ne-Mali-X
faq.a1: Yebo! I-Mali-X inikeza uhlelo lwamahhala kuze kube phakade oluhlanganisa abathengi abangu-10, ukuthengiselana okungakhawulelwanga, imodi ye-Offline, namabhikihli okwamanje. Akukho khadi lekiredithi edingekayo ukuze uqale.
faq.a2: Kakululekile! I-Mali-X yakhiwe njenge-Progressive Web App (PWA) enosizo lwangaphandle olugcwele. Ungawengeza amakhasimende, ukurekhoda ikredithi, futhi ulandele ukukhokha ngisho nangaphandle kwe-inthanethi. Idatha yakho ivumelaniswa ngokuzenzakalela uma ubuyela ku-inthanethi.
faq.a3: Idatha yakho ivumelaniswa ngokuzenzakalela kumaseva ethu aphephile e-cloud nanoma nini uma unoxhumano lwe-inthanethi. Yonke idatha ibhaliswa ngokusebenzisa ukubhalisa kwe-AES-256 komzinga webhange, ngakho-ke amarekhodi akho ahlale ephephile futhi atholakala.
faq.a4: I-Mali-X ixhasa izimali eziningi okuhlanganisa i-TRY (Turkish Lira), i-IDR (Indonesian Rupiah), i-NGN (Nigerian Naira), i-EGP (Egyptian Pound), i-ZAR (South African Rand), nokuningi. I-app itholakala ngamalimi ayi-7: Turkish, Hindi, Indonesian, English, Arabic, Spanish, kanye ne-Zulu.
faq.a5: Ungathumela izikhumbuzi ngokuqondile nge-WhatsApp ngemilayezo egcwele. Vula nje imininingwane yomthengi bese uchofoza inkinobho ye-WhatsApp. Abasebenzisi be-Pro bathola futhi izikhumbuzi ze-SMS ezizenzakalelayo.
faq.a6: Yebo! Ungakhipha izitatimende zamakhasimende njengezinhlelo ze-PDF kanye nomlando wakho wokuthengiselana njenge-spreadsheets ze-CSV. Le nkinga itholakala kuzo zombili izinhlelo zamahhala nezikhokhelwayo.

notFound.title: Ouu! Iphepha Alitholakali
notFound.description: Iphepha olufuna alikho okuysesiqanjini okusanda kuhsudwa.

general.title: Mali-X - I-Bhuku Lekredithi Edijithali Yama-UMKM
general.description: Sebentisana ibhuku lekhathi lakho ne-app yokuphathwa ikredithi ekhaliphile, ethulelekile, iyatholakala sonke.

syncStatus.syncFailed: Ukuvumelanisa kuhlulekile. Thepha ukuze uzame futhi.

legal.title: Isikhungo Somthetho
legal.subtitle: Thola wonke amadokhumenti nobuhlelo bethu bomthetho indawo eyodwa

privacy.title: Inqubomgomo Yobumfihlo
privacy.description: Funda ukuthi siqoqa, sisebenzisa, futhi sivikela kanjani ulwazi lwakho bomuntu siqu

terms.title: Izimo Zokusebenza
terms.description: Izimo nemigomo elawula ukusebenzisa kwakho i-Mali-X

cookies.title: Inqubomgomo Yamakhuki
cookies.description: Ulwazi ngendlela esisebenzisa ngayo amakhuki nobuchwepheshe obufanayo

compliance.title: Ukuvumelana
compliance.description: Amazinga ethu okuvumelana komthetho nokuvikelwa kwedatha

security.title: Ukuvikeleka
security.description: Funda ngamazinga ethu okuvikeleka nensimbi esiyisebenzisayo

contact.title: Imibuzo mayelana nobuhlelo bethu?
contact.description: Ithimba lethu lomthetho liseduze ukusiza. Singathi ukuze uthinte noma yimuphi umbuzo mayelana nezimo zethu, ubumfihlo, noma ukuvumelana.

privacyPage.title: Inqubomgomo Yobumfihlo
privacyPage.intro: E-Mali-X, sithatha ubumfihlo bakho ngokuzwela. Le nqubomgomo yokuvikela incazela indlela esiqoqa, sisebenzise, sixoxe, futhi sivikela ngayo ulwazi lwakho uma usebenzisa insizakalo yethu.

collect.title: Ulwazi Esiluqoqayo
collect.content: Siqoqa ulwazi olusipha ngokuqondile, okuhlanganisa: igama lakho, ikheli le-imeyili, inombolo yocingo, igama lebhizinisi lakho, idatha yamakhasimende, namarekhodi emisebenzi. Futhi siqoqa ngokuzenzakalela ulwazi oluthile uma usebenzisa insizakalo yethu, okuhlanganisa uhlobo lwejini yakho, ikheli le-IP, uhlobo lwebrawuza, nadatha yokusebenzisa.

use.title: Indlela Esisebenzisa Ngayo Ulwazi lwakho
use.content: Sisebenzisa ulwazi esiluqoqile ukuze: sinike futhi sigcine insizakalo yethu, siphathe imisebenzi yakho, sikuthumele izaziso zezobuchwepheshe nemilayezo yosizo, sipendule izimpendulo zakho nemibuzo, silinde futhi sihlasisise izindlela, futhi sithole futhi sivimbe ukukhwabanisa.

sharing.title: Ukwabelana Ngolwazi
sharing.content: Asikuthengisi ulwazi lwakho bomuntu siqu. Singabelana ngolwazi lwakho: abanikezeli bezinsizakalo abenza izinsizakalo ngokwethu, abeluleki bezobuchwepheshe njengamalungisi nabatoliki, kanye nomthethosisekelo uma kudingwa umthetho.

security.title: Ukuvikeleka Kwedatha
security.content: Sisebenzisa izinyathelo zobuchwepheshe futhi zenhlangano ezifanele ukuze sivikele ulwazi lwakho bomuntu siqu ekuphathweni okungavunyelwe noma okungomthetho, ekulahlekeni okungahlosile, ekubhubhiseni, noma ekulimazeni. Sisebenzisa ukubhalisa kwe-AES-256 komzinga webhange yonke idatha eqhumayo nasekufudumeni.

rights.title: Amalungelo Akho
rights.content: Kuye ngendawo yakho, kungaba namalungelo oku: ukufinyelela idatha yakho yomuntu siqu, ukuhlola idatha engalungile, ukususa idatha yakho, ukuphikisa ukuphathwa, nokudluliselwa kwedatha. Sithinte ukuze usebenzise la malungelo.

contact.title: Sithinte
contact.content: Uma unemibuzo mayelana nale nqubomgomo yokuvikela, sicela usithinte ku privacy@globalledger.app

termsPage.title: Izimo Zokusebenza
termsPage.intro: Siyakwamukela ku-Mali-X. Ngokusebenzisa insizakalo yethu, uyavuma lezi zimo. Sicela uzifunde ngokucophelela.

acceptance.title: Ukwamukelwa Kwezimo
acceptance.content: Ngokufinyelela noma ukusebenzisa i-Mali-X, uyavuma ukuba ujabuliswe yilezi Izimo Zokusebenza nawo wonke umthetho nemithethonqubo esebenzayo. Uma ungavumelani nanoma yiziphi kulezi zimo, uvinjelwe ukusebenzisa noma ukufinyelela le nsizakalo.

description.title: Incazelo Yensizakalo
description.content: I-Mali-X inikeza uhlelo lokusebenza lwebhuku lekhredithi yedijithali yama-UMKM ukulandela izikweletu zamakhasimende nezinkokhelo. Insizakalo ihlanganisa ukusebenza kwangaphandle, isipele sewefu, nezici zokubika.

accounts.title: Akhawunti Zomsebenzisi
accounts.content: Uyajabuliswa ukugcina ubumfihlo bezitifikethi zakho zekhawunti. Kufanele unikeze ulwazi olunembile futhi oluphelele uma udala ikhawunti yakho. Uyajabuliswa yonke imisebenzi enhla kwekhawunti yakho.

acceptable.title: Ukusebenzisa Okwamukelekayo
acceptable.content: Uyavuma ukusebenzisa i-Mali-X kuphela ngezinhloso ezomthetho. Awukwazi: ukusebenzisa insizakalo ukugcina noma ukudlulisa ikhodi enobungozi, ukuzama ukufinyelela okungavunyelwe kumajini ethu, ukuphazamisa noma ukuphazamisa insizakalo, noma ukusebenzisa insizakalo ukwephula omunye umthetho.

payment.title: Izimo Zokukhokha
payment.content: Ezinye izici zidinga ukubhalisa okukhokhiswayo. Uyavuma ukukhokha yonke imali ehlobene nekhawunti yakho. Izibhaliso zivuselelwa ngokuzenzakalela ngaphandle kokukhanselwa ngaphambi komhla wokuvuselela. Yonke imikokhelo ayibuyiselwa ngaphandle kokuba kudingwa umthetho.

termination.title: Ukupheliswa
termination.content: Singaphelisa noma sinqamule ibhanki yakho noma ngasiphi isikhathi noma ngasiphi isizathu, okuhlanganisa ukwephula lezi zimo. Ekuphelisweni, ilungelo lakho lokusebenzisa insizakalo lizophelela ngokushesha. Ungaphelisa ikhawunti yakho noma ngasiphi isikhatha ngaphandle kwezilungiselelo zekhawunti yakho.

limitation.title: Umkhawulo Wobunikazi
limitation.content: I-Mali-X angeke ibe nomgqomo noma yikuphi ukulimala okungaqondile, okungahleleki, okukhethekile, okungomphumela, noma okuqondiswayo okusuka ekusebenziseni kwakho noma ukungakwazi ukusebenzisa insizakalo. Ubunikazi bethu obuphelele abuzi ndawo enani olikhokhele kithi ezinyangeni eziyi-12 ezedlule isimangalo.

changes.title: Izinguquko Ezizimweni
changes.content: Siyagcina ilungelo lokulungisa lezi zimo noma ngasiphi isikhathi. Sizokwazisa nganoma yiziphi izinguquko ezibalulekile ngokushicilela izimo ezintsha kuwebhusayithi yethu. Ukusebenzisa insizakalo ngokuqhubeka emva kwezinguquko kuyawamukela izimo ezintsha.

contact.title: Sithinte
contact.content: Uma unemibuzo mayelana nalezi Izimo Zokusebenza, sicela usithinte ku legal@globalledger.app

billing.title: Intengiso & Ukubhalisa
billing.subtitle: Phatha iphulani lakho, intengiso, nezindlela zokukhokha
billing.approachingLimit: Ususeduzelana nomkhawulo. Cabangela ukukhuphula ukwengeza umthamo.
billing.noPaymentHistoryDescription: Umlando wakho wokukhokha uzobonakala lapha ngemva kokukhuphula.
